sentences.english: He had a pipe in his mouth and was smoking.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴裏銜一個菸斗，正吸着煙。

sentences.english: Birds bit its parasitic it wood, and woods which.
sentences.chinese: 禽鳥銜其子寄生它木上，便鬱茂。

sentences.english: He has several honorary professorships from China.
sentences.chinese: 他還獲中國多所大學榮譽教授銜。

sentences.english: Kim Jong Il has also promoted his younger sister Kim Kyong Hui to the rank of general.
sentences.chinese: 金正日同時將他的妹妹金敬姬也任命爲大將軍銜。

sentences.english: He was demoted from the rank of general as a punishment.
sentences.chinese: 作爲處罰，他從將軍銜降下來。
